DOC.brief_summary: Gonadotropin-releasing hormone analogue ( GnRH-a ) synthetic decapeptide compound down-regulate pituitary function cause temporary low estrogen state . Since endometriosis estrogen-dependent disease , use long-acting GnRH-a control growth endometriosis inhibit ovary function.Some scholar find , adenomyosis patient receive super long protocol ( pretreatment long-acting GnRH-a 1-2 month ) IVF treatment , pregnancy outcome comparable control normal uterus . Thus , aim study compare clinical pregnancy rate patient treat GnRH-a 1 , 2 month .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Shorten Gonadotropin-releasing Hormone Agonist Therapy Outcome Vitro Fertilization-Embryo Transfer Patients With Endometriosis
DOC.criteria: first IVF cycle ; normal ovarian reserve ( FSH ( 10miu/mlï¼› antral follicle count ) 3 ) normal uterine Preimplantation genetic diagnosis cycle ; Oocyte donation cycle
